item.description:
Meet New Friends and Enjoy Great Arts and Theatre At Our Group Discount Rate With The CT Theatre Group

THE NUTCRACKER

SAT DEC 5 -2pm & 7pm * SUN DEC 6 -2pm Manchester
SAT DEC 12 -2pm & 7pm * SUN DEC 13 -2pm Windsor

Magical holiday dreams really do come true! A giant Christmas tree that grows before your eyes, valiant toy soldiers, twirling snowflakes, waltzing flowers, and visions of sugarplums...

All this and more come to life on stage in this timeless production. Come experience the magic!
An affordable holiday event not to be missed and a 35 year Connecticut tradition.

Bring the family - This is a Kid-Friendly Event!

* WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF DISCOUNT TICKETS AVAILABLE *

Get your ticket in advance at our Group Discount Rate, and pick up your ticket(s) at the will call window.

Visit http://www.CTTheatreG...
or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your tickets at the Will Call window

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: SAT DEC 12 7pm-*THE NUTCRACKER with the CT Concert Ballet and The Theatre Group
